nodes.text: Sansanna spice was a type of spice found throughout the galaxy, sought after by many criminals.

After the Nightbrothers and renegade Sith Maul and Savage Opress raided a space station in the Cybloc system, they stole a transport ship containing a crate of pure sansanna spice. The crate was discovered by members of Hondo Ohnaka's pirate gang when they boarded the ship.

Lom Pyke, leader of the Pyke Syndicate during the Clone Wars, was an avid consumer of sansanna spice, with his fingers and face stained from heavy usage. Lom also wore an amulet containing some of the spice.
